reference.title: RequestPGN: To request PGN from a node.

section.title: Synopsis
section.codeblock: UINT RequestPGN ( UINT PGN, BYTE DestAdres, UINT Channel)

section.title: Description
section.p: This function will request a PGN from a node in the network.

section.title: Inputs
section.lines: PGN - PGN to be requested. DestAdres - From the node. Channel - Channel number
